title: Metadata in Production

description: In gaming there is a need to have an immutable record of pseudo random numbers generated for auditability by gaming authorities .

title: Sea Safe platform
description:
Property management and marine industry have a common problem:

They are greatly based on hand labour and have long maintenance cycles.

title: Data traceability and verification

title: Smart Authentic Tokenized Assets
